doc.title: Ich Schlinge
doc.plot: A terror sect roaming the countries of the new european economy. Pagan rituals breaking up the smooth surfaces of the globalised hyper-economy. German shock director Christoph Schlingensief has built an interactive religion for unbelievers. Anyone committing an act of art terror can become a holy icon. The film is not only document of this multifaced aggressive art event, spanning well over a year, but also an avantgarde biography of one of the most fascinating artists of our time, able to create with public spheres.
